ISSUE.TITLE: Missing <col> element
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 >There is a missing <col> element inside the table colgroup in the default [_ActiveTopics.cshtml](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Views/Boards/_ActiveTopics.cshtml) file. There are 5 table columns but only 4 <col> elements (It seems the last one is the one that's missing). This results in improper column sizing so perhaps you have to fix it. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/74572/missing-col-element
